You have an uncanny ability to feel Arcana.

  • When you Undertake an Expedition towards a source of magic, get +1. On a Strong Hit also gain +1 momentum.
  • When you Gather Information by letting out Arcana through your body, add +2. Describe how the Arcana twists your view, and on a hit describe how you see through it.
  • When you React Under Fire or Clash and get a miss, you may choose to treat it as a weak hit. Describe how your energy … your magic … YOUR ARCANA SAVES YOU … the situation turns in your favor. Mark a tick on your Arcana Track.
